net.sf.jclec.syntaxtree

Class SyntaxTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclec.syntaxtree.SyntaxTree
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, JCLEC

    public class SyntaxTree
extends java.lang.Object
implements JCLEC
    Syntax tree. This object represents the preorder traversal of a syntax-tree.
    Author:
    Sebastian Ventura
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
